count.description: The number of volumes you wish to create.

datacenter.description: The datacenter in which to create the volumes.

name.description: The name of the volumes. You can enumerate the names using auto_increment.

subscription_user.description: The ProfitBricks username. Overrides the PB_SUBSCRIPTION_ID environment variable.

image_password.description: Password set for the administrative user.

licence_type.description: The licence type for the volume. This is used when the image is non-standard.

image.description: The system image ID for the volume, e.g. a3eae284-a2fe-11e4-b187-5f1f641608c8. This can also be a snapshot image ID.

instance_ids.description: list of instance ids, currently only used when state='absent' to remove instances.

subscription_password.description: THe ProfitBricks password. Overrides the PB_PASSWORD environment variable.

wait_timeout.description: how long before wait gives up, in seconds

auto_increment.description: Whether or not to increment a single number in the name for created virtual machines.

disk_type.description: The disk type of the volume.

ssh_keys.description: Public SSH keys allowing access to the virtual machine.

wait.description: wait for the datacenter to be created before returning
